abstract: Tennis Roundup; Roger Federer withdraws from Miami Open tennis tournament because of stomach virus; other tournament news noted.

headline.print_headline: Federer, Citing Illness, Withdraws in Florida
headline.main: Roger Federer, Citing Illness, Withdraws From Miami Open

snippet: Roger Federer’s comeback from knee surgery will have to wait until the Monte Carlo Masters next month.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer’s comeback from knee surgery will have to wait until the Monte Carlo Masters next month.
